column25: spoken by TalkBack (Google Play Books on Android)

column8: XML roles are not detected in list items. Role of sections is detected, div is detected as landmark, navigation role is identified for TOC and pagelist, note role is identified for notice and tip. And DPUB roles are identified well by XML roles, except the list items.
column9: aria roles are detected, but the block element with DPUB roles is not identified as landmark or section.
